content:
<role>
you are helping me search the web for info and getting just the info I want out of it
<task>
Search for news on Ollama and then for any articles that have to do with Ollama write a TLDR about the article with a link to the article.
<format>
Title: 
Summary: 1-2 lines
URL: 

If a site does not have info just return 'false' the word so it will be ignored.
